com.lightyosft.logmx.gotosource.network

Class SocketListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lightyosft.logmx.gotosource.network.SocketListener

  • public class SocketListener
extends Object
    Listener that will process requests (test, preview, goto) received from LogMX

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String REQUEST_CMD_GOTO
      Request command to go to a source code
      static String REQUEST_CMD_PREVIEW
      Request command to preview a source code
      static String REQUEST_CMD_TEST
      Request command to test IDE plug-in
      static String RESPONSE_OK
      Value returned by the 'test' command in case of success

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static SocketListener getInstance(GotoSourceManager pGotoMgr, PluginLogger pLogger)
      Return the single instance of a SocketListener
      void setConfig(PluginConfig pConfig)
      Set the settings to use by this Listener
      void start()
      Start listening to LogMX requests (test, preview, goto).
      This method creates a new thread in order to open a socket, and listens this socket.
      void stop()
      Stop listening to LogMX requests (test, preview, goto).
      This method closes the socket, and stops the thread.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static SocketListener getInstance(GotoSourceManager pGotoMgr,
                         PluginLogger pLogger)
        Return the single instance of a SocketListener
        Parameters:
        pGotoMgr - GotoSourceManager that will be used to process received requests
        pLogger - PluginLogger that will be used to log information/error messages into IDE logs
        Returns:
        Shared instance of SocketListener

      • start

        public void start()
        Start listening to LogMX requests (test, preview, goto).
        This method creates a new thread in order to open a socket, and listens this socket. The method setConfig(PluginConfig) must be called first.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stop listening to LogMX requests (test, preview, goto).
        This method closes the socket, and stops the thread.

      • setConfig

        public void setConfig(PluginConfig pConfig)
        Set the settings to use by this Listener
        Parameters:
        pConfig - Settings to use
